mil7.4.7:1.1: “Bhante nagasena, ‘candassa panca angani gahetabbani’ti yam vadesi, katamani tani panca angani gahetabbani”ti?
mil7.4.7:1.2: “Yatha, maharaja, cando sukkapakkhe udayanto uttaruttarim vaddhati;
mil7.4.7:1.3: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena acarasilagunavattappatipattiya agamadhigame patisallane satipatthane indriyesu guttadvarataya bhojane mattannutaya jagariyanuyoge uttaruttarim vaddhitabbam.
mil7.4.7:1.4: Idam, maharaja, candassa pathamam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.4.7:2.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena ularena chandadhipatina bhavitabbam.
mil7.4.7:2.3: Idam, maharaja, candassa dutiyam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.4.7:3.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, cando nisaya carati;
mil7.4.7:3.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena pavivittena bhavitabbam.
mil7.4.7:3.3: Idam, maharaja, candassa tatiyam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.4.7:4.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena silaketuna bhavitabbam.
mil7.4.7:4.3: Idam, maharaja, candassa catuttham angam gahetabbam.
mil7.4.7:5.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, cando ayacitapatthito udeti;
mil7.4.7:5.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena ayacitapatthitena kulani upasankamitabbani.
mil7.4.7:5.3: Idam, maharaja, candassa pancamam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.4.7:5.4: Bhasitampetam, maharaja, bhagavata devatidevena samyuttanikayavare ‘candupama, bhikkhave, kulani upasankamatha, apakasseva kayam apakassa cittam niccanavaka kulesu appagabbha’”ti.
